page.title: 10SWINDERBY PLAY AREA.
page.content: The field was bought by the{Parish {Council}at the beginning of 1970. The first committee was for fund raising only, but in 1974 a management committee was formed and officers were elected at its first meeting on the 12th December, 1974.It has 12 members and the original secretary still serves on the committee today. In 1975 a grant was given by the {Lincolnshire Association of Parish {Councils}to improve the site; drainage was done first and then the access road.This was completed with the help of recruits from RAF Swinderby. Next the mound was constructed and the play area is now used as an {adventure}play area.In 1984 new swings and climbing frames were bought.Next a slide is to be installed.The field is used for the Annual{Bonfire Party} in November and for the village galas.
